name: clockmaker_secret
prompt: An old clockmaker builds a clock that can stop time for everyone except the listener. Write what they use it for.
decoded: The old clockmaker uses the clock to tell stories. When they tell a story, the clock stops time for everyone else, allowing the listener to fully immerse themselves in the tale. This unique feature creates an intimate and captivating experience for the listener, as they are the only one who can hear the story unfold.
